timeline.message:
#6666 temporarily disable `shouldComponentUpdate`

- it breaks modals, needs to be less aggressive

timeline.bodyText: If we remove the checks from the shouldComponentUpdate wouldn't this impact the re-renders ? Could be this tuned up to allow the re-renderings in sync with the quickActions store updates ?
timeline.author: petrican

replies.bodyText: I will tune it but it's a hotfix to unblock the customer.
replies.author: siemiatj

timeline.bodyText: If we remove the checks from the shouldComponentUpdate wouldn't this impact the re-renders ? Could be this tuned up to allow the re-renderings in sync with the quickActions store updates ?
